activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13694
activity.text:
Hey @Jacobjeevan @rithviknishad,I would like to work on this.
This happens because the current Zod validation allows whitespaces for string fields—this can be avoided using `.trim()`.
And empty numeric inputs are parsed as null (not triggering "required")-- this can be addressed by using a `z.preprocess` step for numeric fields.
ETA: 1 day

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13629
activity.text:

We can restrict the user from deselecting the value once selected but using conditional logic for field.onChange event handler.
ETA: Today

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13200
activity.text:
Hey team @Jacobjeevan , @rithviknishad if this issue is valid I would like to work on it.
Why this happens : The search input is initially empty due to which the ValueSetSearchContent component displays this.
Possible approach : Modify ValueSetSearchContent to display items by default when the user hasn’t typed anything.
ETA : 1 Day
